original_text: Now the first to resettle on their own property in their own towns were some Israelites, priests, Levites and temple servants.
korean_text: 그들의 땅 안에 있는 성읍에 처음으로 거주한 이스라엘 사람들은 제사장들과 레위 사람들과 느디님 사람들이라

sentences.original_text: Now the first to resettle on their own property
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 자기들의 소유지에 정착한 첫 사람들은

sentences.original_text: on their own property in their own towns
